Articles.Content: Planning on making a base on mun, but not sure what to make it like. inspiration anyone?
There is already a base thread. There's a lot of good stuff there. If you want inspiration, just go flip a few pages there. I'm sure the ideas will start flowing within minutes.
My space program consisted of space stations around Kerbin the Mun Minmus and Duna . Next to the base core and three Kerbalnauts are finishing to set up the docking .
